channel.title: Post your dung experience!
channel.description:
To my knowledge, there aren't any conclusive formulas regarding prestige, floor experience based on complexity, etc. I want to analyze dung experience and try to come up with some basic formulas. I have a few basic ideas of how the growth works for small dungeons, but I can only test slowly and based on my current prestige.
So, whenever you finish a dungeon, please post your prestige level, the floor you completed, that floor's complexity, the number of people you are playing with, the base floor experience, and the base prestige experience (I don't want the average or the experience you actually received for the dungeon).
Thanks!

item.title: Post your dung experience!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

a c6 usually takes double the time a c1 takes, a c6 is x5 to 15x (depends on the f) the xp. so for double the time 5x+ xp is worth it lol.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Loveandpower:

Don’t you think that if I can’t run a recorder with chrome opened, do you really think I can run runescape that great? Come on use common sense.

You don’t need to record the 25 second floor, just post a screenshot of the interface at the end

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Jc22493:

If you posted a pic of a 3:15 c6, why didn’t you just show me a 20 second c1 instead…? Since you already took the effort to take a SS and post it here.

item.title: Post your dung experience!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:49, topic:453129”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=555980.msg4072853#msg4072853 date=1344527418]
I average about 2-3 minutes per c6. It can go up to 4 and 5 when you get to floors 25-30. I dont doubt a team of 5 could rush one in a minute, but it’s probably almost impossible to do that solo without an overload. Though I think I have a record of near 90 seconds solo, which is pretty awesome if I do say so myself.
[/quote]
How do you manage this? It takes me 2:30 on average until like you said 25-30 on c1. Is c6 just not that much harder?[/quote]

Oops, thanks for questioning that. I meant per c1.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your dung experience!
